content: Investments General Asked by AnonymousAsked on 06 Aug 2019Should I hold Japanese yen now or change it all to Singapore dollars since the yen is so high now?Playing a little with the currencies. Should I let go of the Yen now and change it back to SGD since it's so high?1 answerAnswerBump0
Answers (1)Sort By Most UpvoteMost UpvoteMost Recent

JWjiajing wangLevel 3. WonderkidAnswered on 13 Sep 2019How much of the yen you have on hand? Unless you are hard on SGD cash or you will not be going back to Japan, it is still better to hold it with you. The Japanese Yen might fluctuate but unless You are holding worth million of SGD if you convert back from Yen, it is really no point.0 comments1
